Today in Moray, Spey Bay and Lossiemouth are offering fun 2 ft @ 6s E with a moderate 13 mph SSW wind. Best conditions are on the push from 08:42 to 15:26. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 1 ft @ 5s ENE, making it a quiet day across the coast. Day after, conditions worsen with 3 ft @ 4s SW and fresh 30 mph SSW winds, likely blown out. Best: today.
